programme.desc: Way Back When is a 5-episode miniseries centred around Lucas. Fifteen years ago, Lucas developed feelings for Charlotte, and through 5 significant moments in their relationship across the span of 15 years, we come to understand why it wasn't meant to be. At the end, she's leaving the country for good. Will they have one last shot at love?

Soon these "strangers" are drawn together to solve a supernatural mystery - the appearance of Ariel, the sprite bound to Prospero's service. Can the Librarians do what no other human has ever been able - turn their backs on their own ultimate happy endings?

programme.title: Together - EP 33
programme.desc: Jin Hao suffers from syphilis and has rashes all over her body. She goes to Wu Ji for help and he embezzles money from his company to help her. But instead of using the money for medical treatment, she gambles it all away. Jian Hong hears that Jin Hao is missing, and looks for her. She finds a semi-conscious Jin Hao and sends her to the hospital.

programme.title: Together - EP 34
programme.desc: Xiao Bei tells Hui Min that he wants to work at sea. Hui Min knows that once Xiao Bei leaves, he'll never return. She hugs him and asks that he stay, but Xiao Bei refuses. She has no choice but to watch as he leaves.

programme.title: An Ode To Life - EP 15
programme.desc: Ah Zhi is a hapless and simple girl who's in love with an artist Qiming. Deceived by her mother, she is forced to marry into a rich family and is shocked to find out that her husband Wenshou suffers from autism. Not only does Ah Zhi has to take care of her husband, she also has to contend with the scheming machinations of her husband's siblings, as they seek to discredit her; and the distrust of her mother-in-law who believes she brings ill luck to the family.

programme.title: Revolution Sida
programme.desc: Artists, political leaders, researchers and witnesses give a frosty assessment of political and social dysfunctions caused by AIDS, despite outstanding scientific progress. An uncompromising look at what this disease provoked and still inflicts in South Africa, China, Russia or Thailand.

programme.title: #Investigation - EP 6
programme.desc: Your rendezvous for current affairs and investigative journalism from the RTBF teams. Research, evidence, personal stories and confrontations are at the heart of the film reports about a range of subjects mainly relating to Belgian society. The key words? Independence and transparency!

programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Sur Le Front - EP 27
programme.desc: France's soil is dry, crumbly and no longer teeming with living mini-beasts and micro-organisms. The cause: intensive farming. According to the European Soil Institute 80% of agricultural land is degraded and water reserves polluted. Everywhere, those who work the land are fighting to change farming practices.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Alex Beaupain, Je N'aime Que Toi
programme.desc: It's the story of a French singer-songwriter, joyful yet troubled. Beneath the tender and amused gaze of his cellist, Alex Beaupain reveals his inner self. The background to his creations, his finest partnerships, his friends, the stage, losing his first love... Portrait of an artist driven by childhood dream

programme.title: Littoral - EP 15
programme.desc: Explorer, ethnologist, humanist and writer, Paul-emile Victor is the man behind the French Polar Expeditions (EPF) in 1947. He also understood before anyone else how much the north and south poles are indicative of climate change. A journey on his trail starting from Brest, the headquarters of the EPF.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 4
programme.desc: Rather than travelling to the forests of the far north to get close to nature... we'd be better off caring for our urban woodlands. Unfortunately climate change is putting our city trees increasingly at risk.

programme.title: Robert Le Vigan, La Cavale D'un Maudit
programme.desc: From ''Quai des Brumes'' to ''Goupi Mains Rouges'', Robert Le Vigan (1900-1972) is one of the emblematic supporting actors of French cinema. Poetic, tortured, impossible to categorise, the actor was also Celine's best friend and a Nazi collaborator during German occupation. We look back over his career.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Bataille Pour La Foret - EP 4
programme.desc: Rather than travelling to the forests of the far north to get close to nature... we'd be better off caring for our urban woodlands. Unfortunately climate change is putting our city trees increasingly at risk.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 28
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 29
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 16
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 31
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 30
programme.desc: Believing that Mr Agrotek is no longer after Lucie, Leo learns that on the contrary, he's sticking to her like glue. He turns to his last possible helper: Agent Paquet...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 4
programme.desc: Exploring the city of Quebec, all the way to the Saguenay Fjords National Park, in deep mid-winter then in autumn as the forest dons its most vibrant colours. With historian and photographer Pierre Lahoud, we fly over the icebound Saint Lawrence, one of the world's most dangerous navigable waterways.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Le Pays Des Sourds
programme.desc: Jean-Claude, Abou, Claire, Florent and the others are profoundly deaf. They all dream, think and communicate through signs. What is their world like? Nicolas Philibert takes us deep into the land of silence, where sight and touch are so important.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 3
programme.desc: Seeing that Francois and Jean-Pierre are having trouble communicating, Rollande decides to take things in hand and tries to get them to talk openly with one another.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 4
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre and Rollande head off on a cruise after having taken on a security guard to look after their house. On their return, Francois has to suffer the torment of looking at all the holiday photos his parents had taken.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 5
programme.desc: After learning that Rollande wants to write a book and Jean-Pierre dreams of inventing some revolutionary new product, Francois has to face the fact that his parents still aren't happy about leaving him on his own in the house despite his being 47 years old.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents - EP 6
programme.desc: To make up for the children leaving, Jean-Pierre and Rollande decide to adopt a budgerigar and have the greatest difficulty in agreeing on a name for their new pet.

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 7
programme.desc: In the 18th century few women were able to join the Royal Academy of Painting and Sculpture, and work for Europe's most important royalty. With her character of tempered steel and her talent, she became her Marie-Antoinette's official portrait painter.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Merci Professeur ! - EP 77
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 3
programme.desc: To celebrate the programme's 25th anniversary, an exceptional journey to Reunion Island. This volcanic island is one of the highest mountains in the world if measured from the ocean bed at a depth of 4,000 metres. It is also the highest French mountain massif, after the Alps and the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Grand Move - EP 4
programme.desc: Yvan and Louis-Philippe have left their home in Montreal and moved into their very first house, in Rimouski, in the Lower Saint-Lawrence.

programme.title: Alex Beaupain, Je N'aime Que Toi
programme.desc: It's the story of a French singer-songwriter, joyful yet troubled. Beneath the tender and amused gaze of his cellist, Alex Beaupain reveals his inner self. The background to his creations, his finest partnerships, his friends, the stage, losing his first love... Portrait of an artist driven by childhood dream

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 1
programme.desc: In the company of Guylaine Guay and singer Mike Clay, we take a walk along Rue Wellington in Verdun, the ''coolest'' street in the world. What better opportunity to up-date your little black book with some must-visit addresses.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Grand Move - EP 4
programme.desc: Yvan and Louis-Philippe have left their home in Montreal and moved into their very first house, in Rimouski, in the Lower Saint-Lawrence.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 3
programme.desc: To celebrate the programme's 25th anniversary, an exceptional journey to Reunion Island. This volcanic island is one of the highest mountains in the world if measured from the ocean bed at a depth of 4,000 metres. It is also the highest French mountain massif, after the Alps and the Pyrenees.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 30
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 31
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 17
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Toc Toc ! - EP 32
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claude's help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Les Mutants - EP 31
programme.desc: Tom and Leo want to know if their mother is really alive. Unfortunately, the only person who can help them is Guy. But he's been arrested by the police thanks to Zoubi and Lucie.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 1
programme.desc: In the company of Guylaine Guay and singer Mike Clay, we take a walk along Rue Wellington in Verdun, the ''coolest'' street in the world. What better opportunity to up-date your little black book with some must-visit addresses.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 10
programme.desc: Through its reporters spread across the whole of Canada and the four corners of the world, the magazine ''Le Point'' gives a true testimony of what is happening in the major areas of Canada, Europe, Asia, Africa, the USA and Latin America.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Terrible Jungle
programme.desc: Eliott, a naive young researcher, heads off to study a mysterious tribe in Amazonia: the Otopis. An opportunity for him to escape his stiflingly possessive mother, Chantal de Bellabre! But worried about her son, she decides to go in search of him, deep in the jungle...

programme.title: Zzzen
programme.desc: The appearance of a mosquito disturbs the contemplative pilgrimage of a young monk and a chicken.

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Celine are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Celine meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 9
programme.desc: Simone now has the crucial information she needs concerning Anne's personal life. But she'll need Henri's help to corroborate the new lead, and it's going to break his heart. Still obsessed by Marine, Jules gradually becomes closer to her. The teenager is in danger.

programme.title: Cerebrum - EP 10
programme.desc: Undermined by everything he's learnt and no closer to knowing who killed his wife, Henri is exhausted and has no-one to turn to. He thought he could rely on Simone, but she's no longer returning his calls. Tense and apprehensive, the family hope to finally discover the truth.

programme.title: FS MMA Fernando Rodrigues Jr. vs. Karol Bedorf
programme.desc: In this edition of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we highlight the Main Event of KSW 37, featuring Fernando Rodrigues Jr. of Brazil taking on local favorite Karol Bedorf of Poland. Rodrigues brings in a stellar record of 10-2 into the cage, while his opponent Beforf comes in an equally impressive 14-2. It's a huge Main Event from Poland, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights 'Sugar' Shane Mosley (43-4, 37 KOs) and Luis Collazo (27-2, 13 KOs) fighting over the interim WBC title. This fight took place at the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA, on February 10, 2007.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judo's biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Chris Arreola vs. Tomasz Adamek
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Daieisho, Shohozan, Aoiyama and Chiyonokuni from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: In the season finale of American Ninja Warrior, the top contestants from across the nation compete in the ultimate athletic challenge. With the bright lights of Las Vegas shining on the finalists and the crowd cheering on the competition, the ANW finale celebrates the passion of all the aspiring Ninja Warriors that pursued the privilege to grapple with the famously intimidating Mount Midoriyama.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 1
programme.desc: Norrie skips into the Clubhouse and greets her friends. As they greet her, they reminisce about when they first met.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 2
programme.desc: Snail is thrilled to be moving house as she wishes to escape the wet and sploshy place she currently calls home to a more spacious house on the hill.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 3
programme.desc: As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 4
programme.desc: Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 6
programme.desc: When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 7
programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 8
programme.desc: King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 10
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 12
programme.desc: The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 13
programme.desc: The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 14
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 91
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy and LaaLaa follow a trail of muddy footprints and find Po in bed with very muddy feet. The Noo-Noo cleans off the mud.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'bubble' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: Plom, Phoebe, Mae-Mae, Hooper, Zip, and Fly are a group of unique paper friends who live in Pop Paper City. They find new ways to have fun, such as playing pirates, building theme parks and even exploring outer space.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Someone pass Messy the tissues! He discovers that things just don't taste the same when he has a cold, especially his favourite chewy green socks - let's find out why.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 4
programme.desc: Bingo is helping Mum make an omelette for Dad's birthday breakfast, but cracking eggs is harder than it looks, and Dad is getting hungrier by the minute.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 40
programme.desc: It's not a good day to be a glow-worm, when Grandmaster Glitch goes in search of some disco sparkles in New Zealand. Can the Go Jetters stop him?

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 39
programme.desc: The team dives into action as Glitch's treasure hunt endangers the Great Barrier Reef.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 24
programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 23
programme.desc: During a game of Queens, Bluey and Bingo find that playing the butler is much more fun. But someone must play the queen, even if it means not being afraid of a bit of hard work.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Andy heads out on an Arctic adventure to find out where walrus mothers nurse their pups.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S2) - EP 3
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about lavender.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S7) - EP 23
programme.desc: Captain Captain decides to check that Sandy and Seaweed's pirate uniforms are clean, tidy and in perfect order. She is disappointed to discover that Seaweed's headscarf isn't up to scratch.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels get an interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 17
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels think about life's big questions, and gain their Philosophy badges.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 23
programme.desc: A Giant Grandmaster Glitch means BIG trouble for the Giant's Causeway!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Go Jetters must save the famous salt statues in the Wieliczka Salt mine

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 4
programme.desc: Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 24
programme.desc: Mars tries to fill in for a missing Moon, but needs a little coaching from Sarah & Duck.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 23
programme.desc: Stumbling across an arcade, Sarah takes on a dancing challenge with John, whilst Duck and Flamingo team up to try and defeat a video game!

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) - EP 31
programme.desc: Sand Monster Nelly and Sand Monster Nora love to knock down sand castles!

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: The bookshop is cold so Dog and Pug go to the Antarctic to find out how animals keep warm.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran go on a day-trip to the seaside to build a big sandcastle for Panda. But JoJo learns that things need not last forever to be special!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Chilli and Bandit transform the old nursery into a new bedroom for Bluey. In the process, Bluey and Bingo amicably divide their belongings, but get absorbed by trading items and swapping notes at bedtime. Ultimately, when Bluey misses her sister, she asks to return to her old room.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 2
programme.desc: Chilli sets up an obstacle course in the backyard, but Bluey is disheartened when Bandit turns it into a race and beats her. After cheating in a rematch, Bluey discovers the importance of training in order to improve her skills.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 3
programme.desc: Bluey keeps breaking her promises! But after seeing how much Bingo trusts Mum's word, Bluey learns the power of promises and why it's important not to break them.

programme.desc: Tag's feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast, uh-oh!

Then one day Aardvark's tongue got stuck in the honey log! All his friends pulled and pulled until KERPLING! Aardvark's tongue finally came unstuck. From that day on Aardvark's tongue was all long and sticky - perfect for eating yummy termites. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 40

Suddenly an enormous wave picks up Whale and carries her all the way from the ocean to the Waterhole. SPLOSH! But Whale was so full of water that she couldn't move! How do the animals help Whale get back to the ocean? For once, Elephant has the answer. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: Noddy returns from a Make and Take party at Pat-Pat's and finds the Builders are constructing a big orange palace in Toy Green. by order of the King of Toyland! Noddy decides to investigate: who is the mysterious King of Toyland? He spots the Knights carrying a royal litter, but all he can see inside is the top of an orange crown. Realising the King's favourite colour must be orange, Noddy remembers seeing Pat-Pat painting a bowl of oranges and wonders if she knows who the King is.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 41
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Parrot was the best keeper of secrets in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Infact Parrot couldn't open his beak at all! Then one day some beast dares to steal Lion's mane and Parrot sees the whole thing! But how is going to tell Lion?! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 42
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Bushbaby didn't have big eyes. She had tiny little eyes and she was always getting lost. Strange things begin to happen and there are stories that Majitu the Great Giant has returned to Tinga Tinga. Young Bushbaby doesn't believe a word of it... and convinces the other animals that Majitu the Giant does not exist. "If you can't see him, he's not real". But then she does see the Giant and her eyes grow big as planets. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure (S1) - EP 8

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off (S15) - EP 4

programme.title: Secrets Of Our Cities S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: In Fitzroy, now one of Melbourne's most desirable suburbs. Greig Pickhaver discovers that a few decades ago it was a slum before becoming home to European migrants post war looking for cheap rents and a sense of community.

programme.title: Art Works S3 - EP 11
programme.desc: Maggie Hensel-Brown shares her lacemaking practice, and we head to Perth Design Week. Bass guitarist Eric Avery shares his story on INSTRUMENTAL. We see how computers can make art and chat to Dr Leuli Eshraghi.

programme.title: One Plus One - The Elders (2023) - EP 3
programme.desc: Pat Turner works with politicians to improve health outcomes for Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islanders but her life began in Mparntwe (Alice Springs). She shares stories of how activists before her shaped who she is today.

programme.title: Project Wild S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: Dr Ann Jones travels through the Indo-Pacific region to find the dedicated people bringing our planet's amazing animals, plants and ecosystems back from the brink. This time she visits biodiversity-rich Cambodia.

programme.title: Landline (2024) - EP 1
programme.desc: A look back at some of the best stories from Landline in 2024. The brothers behind the largest organically certified land parcel in the world; and what happened to the El Nino? Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: ABC News Regional (2024) - EP 45
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2024) - EP 246
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the day's top stories. Michael Rowland and Bridget Brennan bring you news and interviews, joined by Emma Rebellato, Charles Brice and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2024) - EP 246
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2024) - EP 246
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 68
programme.desc: Want fabulous food for a fraction of the cost? Comedian Adam Spencer and Every Night Of The Week's Lucy Tweed are with Adam to run the numbers.

programme.title: Dream Gardens S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Michael McCoy revisits a garden built after the owners lost their original property in a horror bushfire. (Season Final)

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The end of WW2 marks the beginning of radical transformations to Australia's housing landscape - social, cultural and architectural history is about to unfold in ways never before seen on this vast continent.

programme.title: Landline: Mekong Special (2023) - EP 1
programme.desc: Landline visits South-East Asia where a unique charity in Cambodia gives cows to farmers in return for sending their children to school. In Laos a dairy's buffalo rental scheme is helping lift families out of poverty.

programme.title: One Plus One (2019) - EP 5
programme.desc: Yumi Stynes is a broadcaster, writer and mother-of-four who's carved out a 20-year media career through speaking her mind - while weathering social media storms along the way. She sits down with Jane Hutcheon.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing (2024) - EP 226
programme.desc: Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazines 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the shows wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Millennial Money
programme.desc: Putting the "personal" in personal finance, get an inside look at the lives and finances of millennials. See exactly how much they earn, what they spend it on and how they invest. From starting a business to changing careers, getting in and out of debt, creating an unusual income stream, or casting it all aside to start over again... young people reveal the steps they took to make it happen.

programme.title: Cnbc Tech: The Edge - EP 80
programme.desc: CNBC Tech: The Edge explores the limitless potential of innovation: From how new products and ideas will shape our lives to the long-term investment opportunity thatll bring high yield returns.

programme.title: Meet The Press 2024
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: Asia Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Martin Soong and Sri Jegarajah at the Singapore Exchange (SGX), "Squawk Box" is CNBCs flagship show that sets the news agenda and takes viewers through the pre-game and opening of Asia's business trading day, covering the top market moving stories and views from the top CEOs, asset managers and newsmakers.

programme.title: Europe Squawk Box
programme.desc: Anchored by Steve Sedgwick, Karen Tso and Arabile Gumede, CNBCs flagship show leads you into and delivers the open of the European markets. programme.title: Europe Street Signs
programme.desc: One hour into Europes equity session, "Street Signs" provides the street's view and a link to business stories trending online and on social. programme.title: Us Worldwide Exchange

programme.title: Us Squawk Box

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of days early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.desc: CNBCs "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for todays Investor. programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places. Watch as some of Canada's finest police officers are pushed to the limit in a gruelling 17 week training programme at the PCMP's Police Dog Service Training Centre in Canada.

programme.title: Johnny Kingdom's Wild Countryside
programme.desc: In this series Johnny Kingdom takes us through the enormously varied landscape and wildlife of Exmoor, one of the UK's most glorious national parks.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Trail Town: Down Under
programme.desc: This family-friendly travel show is dedicated to cycling and the great outdoors, and to encouraging more families, couples and friends to explore the world on bicycle.Jump on for the ride of a lifetime as we explore the cycle trails, mountain bike parks, natural beauty and cuisine that Australia and New Zealand has to offer.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Ruang Makna
programme.desc: A program that discusses the meaning of words that are often heard and used every day in the context of life. Presented concisely and easy to understand.

programme.title: Sea Morning Show (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Morning Show delivers up to-date news, live reports, talk shows and features about Indonesia and also Southeast Asia which airs daily 6 - 9 am.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: Tough Boats
programme.desc: A brand new series that explores some of the most fascinating and hard-core boat journeys on the planet. In this mini series we undertake epic journeys by boats in some of the toughest environments on earth. During our journeys we look at how the technology of boat travel has been adapted to survive, trade with and connect isolated communities.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Travel Quest is an eco travel adventure series showcasing some of the most exciting, exotic and often dangerous places in earth Host Bill Ball, a true " challenges himself in each episode as he attempts to check an adventure, thrill or rare animal off his personal bucket list Tracking jaguars, diving with sharks, climbing cliffs in Africa, photographing gorillas, bicycling across the Serengeti and finding cannibals on remote and forbidden islands are all part of his Travel Quest

programme.title: Epic Trails
programme.desc: Epic Trails is a visually stunning and inspiring television series that follows wilderness adventurer, Eric Hanson, on his journey to discover the world's most amazing trails Each 30 minute episode follows Eric on one of his world travels taking viewers on breathtaking adventures while sharing unique stories of the places and the people Eric encounters along the way

programme.title: Sustainable Living
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Green Living
programme.desc: Green Living is a program explores the life of gardening, both small and large scale. Gardening isa fun thing and can be a promising profession. Planters usually own large areas of land, and have patterns and ways to develop their natural products. They will then sell these natural products, in a simple way, which is beneficial for all people.

programme.title: 3-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 3 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 4 - 7 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: World Of Durian
programme.desc: A program that will review all types of durian typical of the archipelago, starting from the history, taste and specialty of each durian.

programme.title: Stories Of Taste
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Crave
programme.desc: A culinary program that finds out what makes celebrities crave fancy food like prata, grilled meat, sushi, satay, ice cream and even a big English breakfast.

programme.title: Apose S1
programme.desc: APOSE: ANAK PODCAST SEJATI tells the story of a podcaster's work life both on air and behind the scenes. In this series, there is a star podcaster who will interview a number of sources who will be present at the office.

programme.title: Pridelands Safari
programme.desc: Join Brent Leo Smith and his amazing collegues for highlights from their exciting facinating adventures on the pridelands conservancy in the greater Kruger National Part, South Africa.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTNs Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Faces of Africa
programme.desc: Faces of Africa is a topical magazine that showcases the diversity of the continent. Faces of Africa is about people. From intimate portraits of ordinary citizens to discussions with political, economic and civic leaders, Faces of Africa features compelling stories from an up close perspective.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. _x000D_An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world. Broadcast from CGTNs production center in the Kenyan capital, Nairobi, Talk Africa looks at Africa and the world from an African perspective.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on Chinas rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the countrys culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world._x000D__x000D__x000D_

programme.desc: Mahiro is involved in a battle with exotic sea rovers, and Zhou Ming falls due to enemy attack. Meanwhile, the damage situation of the attack from the invaders is reported to the Imperial Cout, which causes an uproar, but the regent Yorimichi doesnt respond and even stops reporting it to Michinaga. Sanesuke (Akiyama Ryuji) is frustrated at this situation, but finally receives a follow-up letter from Takaie in Dazaifu, which informs Michinaga of the foreign threat.

The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Drama 10 "The Classroom Across the Universe" Eps. 9 (R)
programme.desc: The story is set in a part-time high school in Shinjuku, Tokyo, where students of different ages and backgrounds, each with diverse circumstances, attend. Under the guidance of the mysterious science teacher Fujitake (Kubota Masataka), who was assigned to the school, they aim to present at an academic conference with an experiment to recreate a Mars crater in the classroom. However, many challenges, including personal obstacles, family troubles, and unbreakable relationships, stand in their way.

programme.title: News Around Japan
programme.desc: Program introduces the latest news from all over Japan.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: World Music Album
programme.desc: A 5-minute music program introducing classical music.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Hobbies--Sparkle Your Life!
programme.desc: Enjoy learning various kinds of hobbies lectured by a master of the field. A new theme will be introduced every two months.

programme.title: Points at Issue
programme.desc: Specialists from different fields will make commentaries on current event issues.

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say (R)
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: Gentle Journeys (R)
programme.desc: A journey to the different places around Japan.

programme.title: Nosy's Inspiring Atelier (R)
programme.desc: Curious fairies "Nosy" create unique works using their imaginations, inspired by interesting phenomena and materials they found in the world of humans. Lets express your idea through creation with Nosy, as you think and explore.

programme.title: PythagoraSwitch
programme.desc: There are various interesting laws and rules and philosophies hidden in our daily lives. This program introduces children to them and how to think.

programme.title: Let's Enjoy English and Meets the World
programme.desc: Children search for wonders worldwide and challenge themselves to communicate with foreigners in English through puppet shows, games, animation, and more. Have fun and learn English naturally with a witch, Kyary Pamyu Pamyu!

programme.title: Peek-a-boo
programme.desc: Bringing out potential and capability of children aged 0 to 2 years by stimulating their feelings with pictures and sound.

programme.title: With Mother
programme.desc: This children's program includes a puppet show, cartoon, music, and gymnastics in which children can participate.

programme.title: 1-Minute Anime: Songs for SDGs
programme.desc: Lets learn about SDGs while singing along! A selected goal out of 17 will be introduced in each one-minute song with animation.

programme.title: Kid's Discovery
programme.desc: In this program, children around the age of 4 can experience the pleasure of playing with friends, the wonder of life, the joy of doing thigs by themselves, and consideration for others, all while having fun through various discoveries.

programme.title: Whiz-Kids TV
programme.desc: Lets cooperate with TV warriors and take on various missions to revive the symbol tree of "Geoworld," a mysterious otherworldly realm rich in nature!

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 7 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's core news program wrapping up the day's events in an easy to understand way.

programme.title: Today's Close-up
programme.desc: The program flexibly probes into a wide range of topics from the NHKs unique point of view.

programme.title: Song Concert
programme.desc: The best of the singers will perform on the gorgeous stage with relays from various places in Japan.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 845
programme.desc: Today's latest metropolitan area news and weather information program.

programme.title: News Watch 9 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's mainstay evening news program.

programme.title: Drama 10 "The Classroom Across the Universe" Eps. 10 (Final)
programme.desc: The story is set in a part-time high school in Shinjuku, Tokyo, where students of different ages and backgrounds, each with diverse circumstances, attend. Under the guidance of the mysterious science teacher Fujitake (Kubota Masataka), who was assigned to the school, they aim to present at an academic conference with an experiment to recreate a Mars crater in the classroom. However, many challenges, including personal obstacles, family troubles, and unbreakable relationships, stand in their way.

programme.title: WARUIKOATSUMARE: For Everyone to Enjoy and Learn about Society
programme.desc: Lets enjoy learning about society with a new educational variety show suitable for children and adults!

programme.title: News Commentary
programme.desc: NHK news commentators give their views on current issues.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: Recipe for Fulfilling Second Life!
programme.desc: An information program for people in their 50s and 60s providing tips on how to have a fulfilling second life.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Porto is the second largest city in Portugal. Porto's Historic Center, which is a World Heritage site, and the Gaia District, which is lined with Port wine cellars, are separated by the Douro River.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: The Amakusa region has over 120 islands and is home to one of the places where a unique form of Christianity developed. See Amakusa's historic sights and natural beauty through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Towada
programme.desc: Towada-Hachimantai National Park comprises the nature-rich Oirase-Keiryu, the crystal-clear Lake Towada, and the lush marshlands of Mt. Hachimantai. It presents nature in its many forms.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions
programme.desc: The stories behind hit Japanese products, plus top creations for niche markets. This time: diagnostic ultrasound machines & sports balls.

programme.title: Bosai
programme.desc: Droughts are increasing and simulations predict that megadroughts could occur in the future. Discover Japan's technology that could solve water scarcity.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Visit Izumo, Shimane, the setting of several Japanese myths, to meet a mischievous kitty living on a farm near Hii River. Then head to a pottery factory to see a blue-eyed cat hard at work.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Long Journey For Peace
programme.desc: Tsuboi Sunao met the US President in Hiroshima in 2016. For the then 92-year-old atomic bomb survivor, the encounter was but one step in a decades-long journey to abolish nuclear weapons.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Another Story
programme.desc: In 2016, Obama became the first sitting US President to visit Hiroshima. Watch and learn how that historic day came to be, including interviews with hibakusha survivors and Obama's speechwriter.

programme.title: National Parks Of Japan:Daisen-Oki
programme.desc: Daisen-Oki National Park comprises the Oki Islands, which boast spectacular geological formations, and a mainland area with shrines and sacred mountains that gave rise to myths and legends.

programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: US Influences.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Today'S Close-Up
programme.desc: Japan is seeing a rise in real estate fraud targeting elderly people living alone. We explore ways to protect people with cognitive decline from scam sales of unwanted land and property.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 930

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: There's a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwan's beautiful and gifted environment.

programme.desc: The story centers Liu Mian Tang (Wang Chu Ran), who is severely injured and rescued by Cui Xing Zhou (Zhang Wan Yi). Mian Tang mistakes Xing Zhou for her husband after waking up with amnesia. She follows him to guard the frontier, and eventually fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1838
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Forensic Heroes V - EP 27
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the Forensic Heroes series revolves around the Hong Kong Police Department working through forensics and criminal investigation, getting to the bottom of missing evidence and cunning criminals, and eventually giving justice to victims!

programme.title: Forensic Heroes V - EP 28
programme.desc: The fifth installment of the Forensic Heroes series revolves around the Hong Kong Police Department working through forensics and criminal investigation, getting to the bottom of missing evidence and cunning criminals, and eventually giving justice to victims!

programme.title: Only For Love - EP 12
programme.desc: Hardworking financial reporter Zheng Shu Yi (Bai Lu) is determined to land a front-page story with Shi Yan (Dylan Wang) a successful young CEO that the whole city is talking about. She pulls all the stops, eventually gets through to him and even love blossoms.

programme.title: Only For Love - EP 13
programme.desc: Hardworking financial reporter Zheng Shu Yi (Bai Lu) is determined to land a front-page story with Shi Yan (Dylan Wang) a successful young CEO that the whole city is talking about. She pulls all the stops, eventually gets through to him and even love blossoms.

programme.title: Hilarious Family - EP 6
programme.desc: This heartwarming drama tells the story of Du Ruyu (Liu Lin), a single mother who has been widowed for 18 years, raising her four daughters, each with very different personalities, on her own. The family is filled with both laughter and tears.

programme.title: Choice Husband - EP 18
programme.desc: Shen Miao is the treasured daughter of the wealthiest merchant in Yangzhou City but is not the luckiest when it comes to marriage. Stay tuned to a twisted love tale she's involved between a talented scholar and rich glib.

programme.title: Golden City - EP 511
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1838
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Vista of China (Sr.17) - EP 72
programme.desc: Through the program, explore the different development and new features of the Chinese nation from different perspectives, and understand Chinese culture in ancient and modern China and abroad.

programme.title: Sky is the Limit, The - EP 15
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 17
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: Life Made Simple - EP 18
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_ WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. programme.title: My Ages Apart - EP 25
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: Word Twisters' Adventures - EP 6
programme.desc: The most difficult thing for an articulate legal expert is not to win a lawsuit but to bargain for a twist of fate. Plagued by a mysterious family curse, CHAN MUNG-KAT (Chan Siu Chun), who comes from a legal family, is forced to fool around and devotes all his time to running a brothel despite his great talent.

programme.title: As Sure as Fate - EP 6
programme.desc: Due to business failure, De (Yuan Siu-hsiang) and his wife Mei (Kwok Siu-yun) returned to Hong Kong from Canada to seek further development due to business failure. rapport. However, De's father (Guo Feng) felt that the space at home was cramped, so he decided to sell his old residence and loaned the deposit received at high interest to his daughter Fei (Teng Liming)'s boyfriend Jian (Xie Tianhua).

programme.title: Ringmaster, The - EP 6
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-heis boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: Last Breakthrough, The - EP 22
programme.desc: Dr. WONG PO FUN (CHEUNG KA FAI, NICK) joins "Life Force", an international medical humanitarian organization, to carry out the unfulfilled wish of his deceased girlfriend, TUNG (LEUNG WING KEI, GIGI). He also sets up "Lung Shing Medical Centre" to help the poor. _x000D__x000D_ When FUN is working with the organization in Kenya, he meets a young doctor called CHAI PAK HANG (LAM, RAYMOND), who works at a private hospital named "Ling Siu" in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Vigilante Force - EP 15
programme.desc: Serious Crime sergeant, AH (LAM, BOWIE), grew up in a village in the New Territories. He is well respected by his colleagues. He works hard hoping to earn a promotion. One day, the headquarters appoints a superior, YIN (MA TAK CHUNG, JOE), to his division, killing all his hope. AH gets along with his colleagues. YIN is straight with his subordinates. Who will gain more co-operation from their colleagues? _x000D__x000D_ AH devotes himself to work.
